title: Herb Roscoe, D.C.
description: Herb Roscoe, D.C. practices as a Chiropractor in Flagstaff, AZ.
cleaned_text: 86004. Chiropractors diagnose and treat common spinal misalignments that can occur from lifestyle or injuries causing pain, discomfort and degenerative conditions. Herb Roscoe, D.C. may be able to treat; back pain, sciatica, neck pain, shoulder pain, headaches, sports injuries, and auto accident injuries. To learn more, or to make an appointment with Herb Roscoe, D.C. in Flagstaff, AZ, please call (928) 527-1688 for more information. I am a physician. I have been to many chiropractors. Dr Roscoe is the most knowledgable and the most effective doctor I have ever gone to. His knowledge of the spine and central nervous system rivals any neurologist I have ever worked with. He has reduced the pain I've had for over 20 years to almost nothing. I am going to cry when he retires.
